summary: Implements the PrismaEngine that manages the end‑to‑end workflow of Prisma‑based static application security testing, including artifact preparation, execution of scans on supported platforms, aggregation of results, application of policy and severity filters, and generation of structured security reports.
business_intent: Enable automated, policy‑driven security assessment of codebases using Prisma, allowing teams to detect and remediate vulnerabilities early in the development pipeline.
